extension_description.message: A handy tool for web developers to learn, check and report site compatibility issues directly within Firefox Developer Tools.

feed_fetch_error.message: Couldn’t load the news feed. Please try again later.

feed_fetch_offline.message: You’re currently offline. The news feed will be loaded after going online.

checker_under_development_note.message: This compatibility checker is under development, and it may not show all known issues. Give us feedback via GitHub.

checker_unselected.message: Select an element to find the compatibility issues.

deprecated_known_removed_known.message: deprecated since Firefox $deprecated_version$, removed with Firefox $removed_version$

deprecated_known_removed_future.message: deprecated since Firefox $deprecated_version$, will be removed in the future

deprecated_unknown_removed_future.message: deprecated, will be removed in the future

reporter_paragraph_1.message: Let us know if you found a website — even your own — that doesn’t work properly only in Firefox! We are happy to investigate the issue and take a possible action to solve it. We can be reached by:

about_paragraph_1.message: The Firefox Site Compatibility Working Group is an independent community initiative tackling the backward compatibility and regressions in Firefox. We are creating this browser extension as a handy all-in-one tool for web developers to learn, check and report site compatibility issues directly within Firefox Developer Tools. The source code is available on GitHub, and we are also on Twitter. Your feedback is always welcome!
